availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Green County, Kentucky, native. Married to America F. Myers Crail in Green County, Kentucky, in April 1852. Father of Lorena Crail and Absalom H. Crail. Married to Keziah Mathis Crail in Green County on November 27, 1860. Father of America P. Crail. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Served in the 21st Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a musician and private from December 30, 1861, to September 30, 1862. Discharged on account of disability on September 30, 1862.
